DOC.brief_summary: Randomised Controlled Trial Assess Accuracy , Feasibility , Acceptability , Cost Effectiveness Impact Point Care CD4 Testing HIV Diagnosis , Linkage Care Time Antiretroviral Therapy Initiation among HIV Infected Patients Rural Western Kenya .
DOC.brief_title: Impact Linkage HIV Care With Point Care CD4 Testing Home-based HIV Testing Kenya
DOC.criteria: adult live study catchment area ( Gem Village , Nyanza province Western Kenya ) serve one 23 HIV clinic 3 referral lab Not receive HIV care prior 6 month know HIV+ current HIV care HIV care within last six month
